4.res: Your JBL Boombox includes a 20,000 milli-amp battery and dual charge-out to charge your external devices.  It'll take about 6 hours to get it to full charge. The speaker is made with rugged materials, as well as being IPX7 waterproof, able to withstand any weather.  It incorporates 4 active transducers and 2 bass radiators.  Refer to the enclosed setup guide to get it paired using standard bluetooth.  You're going to love your new JBL Boombox -- grab the handle and take it anywhere.  For more fantastic products from JBL, just go to Amazon.com and type JBL into the search box.  Rock on!
